subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Goaltenders typically want to play as many games as they can, and some of the best, like Martin Brodeur and Grant Fuhr, have exceeded 70 in a season while remaining effective in the playoffs.
snippet: Goaltenders typically want to play as many games as they can, and some of the best, like Martin Brodeur and Grant Fuhr, have exceeded 70 in a season while remaining effective in the playoffs.
